item.description:
We have been here before and always had a great time.

It is across the street from the back parking lot of the
Stonebridge Restaurant.

Best parking is to go past the Café, take a right,
Go under the rail road bridge and there is usually
Some parking on the right.

It is a very small, French style Café.
I have read that it is recently under new ownership
So it will be interesting to see if there have been any
Changes.

In warmer weather we can sit outside of the Café,
But not during our current cold weather.

I will have a purple backpack.

http://www.cafeatlant...

www.cafeatlantique.us/

There will be great coffee and delicious food.

Thank you!

I hope to see you there!

Many of you have not been to an event for months.

Mike B.
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a purple backpack.
item.name: Coffee Talk goes back to Cafe Atlantique on Feb. 13
